attributes.action: Ban the release of the Bollywood movie "Singh is Kinng".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This film stars Akshay Kumar as the lead role, who's characters appearance on pre-release posters is misleading and will/has hurt Sikh sentiments.

Sikhism's fundamental values include not cutting hair which includes facial hair, and Akshay Kumar's portrayal of a Sikh in a Sikh Turban with the Sikh Emblem pinned on it and a clean shaved face is both hurtful to Sikh sentiments and blasphemous to the Sikh faith. The title of the film is demeaning and is making a mockery of the title "Singh" which was given to the Sikhs by the Tenth Guru himself. 

we the undersigned therefore urge the PM to ban the filsm release in the UK
